name: Create Protocol for bioburden residue verification for non split

descriptionHtml: This test case tests API to Create Protocol bioburden residue verification for split when select based on policy for fungal & bacterial of direct, and for bacterial & fungal of Indirect when default surface unit is sqcm and volume is L
statusMessage: AssertionError: Direct Swab perUnitAreaAndVolume Values Do Not Match

self = <test_multi_prodcution_protocol.TestMultiProductionProtocol object at 0x0000026819773210>

    @allure.title("Create Protocol for bioburden residue verification for non split")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Create Protocol bioburden residue verification for split "
                        "when select based on policy for fungal & bacterial of direct, and  for bacterial & "
                        "fungal of Indirect when default surface unit is sqcm and volume is L")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cuhb2hv")
    @pytest.mark.formulation
    @pytest.mark.create_bioburden_residue_verification_protocol_sqcm_l
    def test_create_bioburden_residue_verification_protocol_sqcm_l(self):
        bioburden_data = {}
        bioburden_data.update(self.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQCM)
        unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(bioburden_data)["response"]
        unit = json.loads(unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
        bioburden_data.update(self.DEFAULT_VOLUME_L)
        volume_unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(bioburden_data)["response"]
        volume_unit = json.loads(volume_unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
    
        if unit != "sqcm" and volume_unit != "L":
            self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(bioburden_data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        columns_prod = ["production_id"]
        productions_list = Excel.read_excel_columns(const.get_master_data(), "config", columns_prod)
        data = {"production": productions_list["production_id"], "description": "Automation Protocol"}
        protocol_detail, data = self.setup_protocol(data)
        self.multi_protocol.PROTOCOL = json.loads(protocol_detail)
        data.update({"protocol_name": None})
        protocol_id = self.multi_protocol.get_protocol_id(data)
        data.update({"protocol_id": protocol_id, "bioburden_verification": True})
        data.update({"update_verification_protocol": protocol_verification_payload(data)})
        get_equipment = self.protocol_equipment.get_equipment_protocol(data)["response"]
    
        self.protocol_bioburden.PROTOCOL_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(get_equipment)
    
        self.protocol_verification.update_inspection_protocol(data)
    
        direct_equipments_sal = \
            self.protocol_bioburden.get_bioburden_direct_contact_surface_area_details(data)["response"]
        self.protocol_bioburden.DIRECT_BIOBURDEN_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(direct_equipments_sal)
        indirect_equipment_sal = \
            self.protocol_bioburden.get_bioburden_indirect_contact_surface_area_details(data)["response"]
        self.protocol_bioburden.INDIRECT_BIOBURDEN_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(indirect_equipment_sal)
    
        direct_equipment = self.protocol_bioburden.direct_update_policy_payload()
        indirect_equipment = self.protocol_bioburden.indirect_update_policy_payload()
    
        data.update({"direct_equipment": direct_equipment, "indirect_equipment": indirect_equipment,
                     "direct_fungal_policy": "policyBased", "direct_bacterial_policy": "policyBased",
                     "indirect_fungal_policy": "policyBased", "indirect_bacterial_policy": "policyBased"})
        data.update({
            "update_bioburden_residue_verification_payload": update_bioburden_residue_verification_fungal_bacterial_payload(
                data)})
    
        updated_data = self.protocol_bioburden.update_bioburden_residue_verification_protocol(data)["response"]
        updated_data = json.loads(updated_data)["result"]["bioburdenResidueVerification"]
>       self.protocol_bioburden.compare_bioburden_limits_split(updated_data, "direct", "fungal")

self = <tests.unit.protocols.protocol_bioburden_residue_verification.ProtocolBioburdenAcceptanceCriteria object at 0x000002681970AE10>
data = {'direct': {'bacterial': {'equipments': {'115': {'enabled': True, 'perUnitArea': {'unit': 'sqcm', 'value': 6.999999999...'value': 30}, 'perUnitVolume': {'unit': 'ml', 'value': 26000}, 'rinseLimit': 33, ...}, ...}, 'policy': 'policyBased'}}}
response_type = 'direct', microbial_type = 'fungal'

    def compare_bioburden_limits_split(self, data, response_type, microbial_type):
        microbial_policy = self.policy_microbial.test_get_microbial_cleaning_limits_policy()["response"]
        policy_data = json.loads(microbial_policy)
    
        first_response = self.extract_values(policy_data, response_type)
        second_response = self.get_limits(data, response_type, microbial_type)
    
        def extract_microbial_values(response, microbial_type):
            unclassified_values = response.get('unclassified', {}).get(microbial_type)
            default_values = response.get('default', {}).get(microbial_type)
            return unclassified_values or default_values
    
        # Extract microbial values from the first response
        swab_response = first_response.get(f'{response_type.capitalize()} - Swab', {})
        microbial_swab_first_response = extract_microbial_values(swab_response, microbial_type)
        per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response = None
        if microbial_type == "fungal":
            per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response = swab_response.get('unclassified', {}).get(
                'fungal_per_unit_volume')
    
        if microbial_type == "bacterial":
            per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response = swab_response.get('unclassified', {}).get(
                'bacterial_per_unit_volume')
    
        # Extract microbial values from the second response more explicitly
        second_response_key = list(second_response.keys())[0] if second_response else None
        microbial_swab_second_response = second_response.get(second_response_key, {}).get('swab_limit', {}).get('value')
        per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response = second_response.get(second_response_key, {}).get('swab_limit', {}).get('perUnitArea', {}).get('value')
    
        # Compare values with assert statements
        if microbial_swab_first_response is not None and microbial_swab_second_response is not None:
            assert microbial_swab_first_response == microbial_swab_second_response, f"{response_type.capitalize()} Swab {microbial_type.capitalize()} Values Do Not Match"
        if per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response is not None and per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response is not None:
>           assert per_unit_area_and_volume_first_response == per_unit_area_and_volume_second_response, f"{response_type.capitalize()} Swab perUnitAreaAndVolume Values Do Not Match"
